name: Patchwork Kingdom #506 | Runthor
description: The twin kingdoms of Runthor, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 71 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 39 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
